segments.text: Lodge , You must come around sometime , You have to check out my mew stereo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , When is good time for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you make it on Tuesday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time do you want me there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anytime after six will be fine .
segments.speaker: S1
